channel.title: Procedure help plz
channel.description:
Hello guys, I got a little problem with a script iam developing. I just make scripts for a short periode, so I need some help, maybe you are the one who can help me. I made some procedures, for examble: procedure 1 procedure 2 procedure 3 ---------------
begin procedure 1 procedure 2 procedure 3 end. --------------- In procedure 1 i got an if function. if ......... then ......... end else '[b]Go to the next procedure/continu script'[/b] ------------------------ Question: What function I need to reach what I want (the bold text). (I do not want ---- end else 'procedure 2'---, cause I want to make an universal script)??
Thank you already, bonoon

item.title: Procedure help plz
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I think I get what you’re saying. If you have an if statement in one of your procedures and if whatever is true, then you want it to do something, and then you added an “end else” after that and you just want it to continue with the script then.

Well, don’t even put an end else there. Just put an end; and if the statement is true then do whatever, otherwise it will just skip it and like you said, continue with the script.

Read full topic

item.title: Procedure help plz
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

your questions are very confusing, what are you actually trying to say?

Read full topic

item.title: Procedure help plz
item.dc:creator: @bonoon bonoon
item.description:
@bonoon wrote:

Hello guys, I got a little problem with a script iam developing. I just make scripts for a short periode, so I need some help, maybe you are the one who can help me. I made some procedures, for examble:
procedure 1
procedure 2
procedure 3

begin
procedure 1
procedure 2
procedure 3
end.

In procedure 1 i got an if function.
if … then …
end else 'Go to the next procedure/continu script’

Question: What function I need to reach what I want (the bold text). (I do not want ---- end else ‘procedure 2’—, cause I want to make an universal script)??

Thank you already, bonoon

Read full topic
